branchCategory.name: Precision Slide Tables for Clean Room - 11/13/22-MX*
branchCategory.description: <p>These precision slide table variations of series MXQ, MXS, MXP, MXJ, and MXPJ6 are specified for use in clean room environments.</p>

breadCrumb.name: Precision Slide Tables for Clean Room - 11/13/22-MX*

branchItem.name: 13/22-MXQ, Precision Slide Tables (Recirculating Bearings) - Clean Room/Copper, Fluorine, Silicone-free Series
branchItem.description: <P>The 13/22-MXQ, clean room precision slide table uses a specially treated Martensitic stainless steel for its table and guide block to isolate the load bearing from the movement of the dual rods and pison seals to reduce particle generation. A relief plate was added to the body to house relief bushings and a vacuum port to vacuum particles equally on both sides of the piston rods to prevent particle leakage. Silicon rubber dust covers and plugs have also been attached to the floating parts to prevent particles from leaking.</P>

branchItem.name: 13-MXS, Precision Slide Tables (Cross Roller Bearings) - Clean Room Series
branchItem.description: <p>The 13-MXS is a clean room, precision slide table integrated with guides and rails combined with cross roller bearings to isolate the load bearing from the movement of the dual rods and piston seals. Its surfaces are electroplated using RAYDENT treatment technology, completely integrating the RAYDENT coating with the base metal so the semi-permanent coating will not separate or exfoliate. A relief plate was added to the body to house relief bushings and a vacuum port to vacuum particles equally on both sides of the piston rods to prevent particle leakage. Silicon rubber dust covers and plugs have also been attached to the floating parts to prevent particles from leaking.</p>

branchItem.name: 13-MXSL, Precision Slide Tables (Cross Roller Bearings) - Clean Room Series, Symmetrical Type
branchItem.description: <p>The 13-MXS*L is a clean room, precision slide table integrated with guides and rails combined with cross roller bearings to isolate the load bearing from the movement of the dual rods and piston seals. The ports and stroke adjuster positions are located opposite from the 13-MXS, clean room type in a symmetrical or mirror image of each other to minimize clearance for adjacent mounting applications. Its surfaces are electroplated using RAYDENT treatment technology, completely integrating the RAYDENT coating with the base metal so the semi-permanent coating will not separate or exfoliate. A relief plate was added to the body to house relief bushings and a vacuum port to vacuum particles equally on both sides of the piston rods to prevent particle leakage. Silicon rubber dust covers and plugs have also been attached to the floating parts to prevent particles from leaking.</p>

branchItem.name: 11/22-MXP, High Precision Slide Table (Recirculating Bearings) - Clean Room/Copper, Fluorine, Silicone-free Series
11-MXJ, Miniature Precision Slide Table (Linear Bearings) - Clean Room Series
branchItem.description: <p>The 11-MXJ miniature precision slide table provides travelling parallelism of 0.005 mm in a compact package, height: 10 mm and width: 20mm for the 4 mm bore size. . Its actuator body and guide block are made from Martensitic stainless steel for high rigidity and integrated to guide rails for isolating the load bearing from the movement of the piston rod and seals. A special PTFE grease has been applied to both the linear guide and piston to inhibit dust generation. A vacuum relief port, which can be specified on either the right or left-side of the body, has been added to suction any particles so no dust can be released into the clean room. The ports and switch grooves can also be specified on either the right or left-side of the body, in a symmetrical location in order to minimize side clearance for adjacent mounting applications.</p>

branchItem.name: 11/22-MXPJ6, Miniature High Precision Slide Table (Recirculating Bearings) - Clean Room/Copper, Fluorine, Silicone-free Series
